app.title: Videoleap: AI Video Editor
app.description:
Create Stunning Reels, Videos & Shorts with AI - The Ultimate AI Video Generator, Reel Maker & Video Enhancer!

Unleash your creativity and produce scroll-stopping content effortlessly with Videoleap, your all-in-one AI-powered video editor, reel maker, and video enhancer. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or a seasoned content creator, Videoleap gives you the tools to transform your ideas into high-quality, professional videos in just minutes.

üé• The Smartest Way to Create Reels, Videos & Clips
 Videoleap combines powerful AI video generator features with an easy-to-use editor, allowing you to create standout reels, shorts, and stories for platforms like Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok. Add music to videos, enhance video quality, and apply AI effects, no prior editing experience needed!

‚ú® Why Choose Videoleap?
AI Video Generator & AI Video Editor: Let AI help you create stunning videos. Generate content automatically, apply AI filters and effects, and bring everyday footage to life with pro-level enhancements.

Reel Maker & Video Creator: Design beautiful reels, shorts, stories, and video ads. Use ready-made templates or start from scratch to produce content that grabs attention.

Enhance Video Quality Instantly: Sharpen details, adjust brightness, contrast, and saturation, or apply 4K-quality enhancement with our powerful video enhancer tools.

Perfect for Everyone: From influencers and small business owners to vloggers, marketers, and casual users, Videoleap makes video creation easy and fun for all.


‚ö° Key Features & Tools
AI-Powered Video Editing: Automatically generate videos or apply AI-driven enhancements, effects, and filters.

Pro Editing Tools: Trim, cut, crop, split, merge, resize, rotate, or flip videos with ease. Adjust aspect ratios and fit clips perfectly for any platform.

Music, Captions & Intros: Add music to videos, create stunning intros and outros, and customize captions with stylish fonts, emojis, and blending options.

Templates for Reels, Stories & Shorts: Access trending templates designed for Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, TikTok, and more. Simply pick a template and customize it in seconds.

Special Effects & Filters: Blur, glitch, pixelate, apply prism, chromatic aberration, VHS effects, and more to give your videos a unique cinematic style.

Speed Control & Motion Effects: Speed up, slow down, or loop videos. Create dramatic slow motion, dynamic time-lapse, or stop motion clips.

Layer-Based Editing: Combine videos, images, effects, and music in customizable layers. Use masking, blending, and transformation tools for advanced compositions.

üåü For Business & Social Success
Videoleap is more than just a video editor, it‚Äôs your partner in creating impactful content that helps you grow your brand, promote your business, and engage your audience. Use our video maker with AI tools to create promotional ads, social posts, and professional reels that stand out from the crowd.

üì≤ Who Is Videoleap For?
Influencers & Content Creators: Produce aesthetic reels, engaging stories, and YouTube shorts that build your following.

Small Business Owners: Make professional ads, video promos, and social media content with ease.

Vloggers & Everyday Users: Turn moments into masterpieces with a few simple taps.

Marketers: Create high-impact video campaigns with ready-made business video templates.

Download Videoleap now and start creating reels, shorts, and videos that get noticed. Experience the future of video editing with our AI video generator, reel maker, and video enhancer, all in one powerful app!

Videoleap is a part of Creative Suite, which includes a wide range of free AI video editor and image editing apps.
Facetune: selfie photo & AI video editing
Photoleap: picture editor for blending & animation

Videoleap AI Video Editor Terms of use: https://static.lightricks.com/legal/terms-of-use.html
Videoleap AI Video Editor Privacy policy: https://static.lightricks.com/legal/privacy-policy.html

app.summary: AI video generator, reel maker & movie creator. Enhance video quality with AI

reviews.text: Free trial appears to be a scam. Wish I had read the reviews about this before just jumping in to try it. When it was time to cancel, I now get an error message from the app when I try to log in and the website login option texts you a code but never advances past that screen so you cannot cancel the free trial. The video app doesn't offer voiceover for Android, an essential feature for me. It took a few days for support to confirm this as many features just not intuitive.
reviews.replyText: Sorry to hear this. Please contact us directly so that we can help. To do this, please tap on your Profile, tap on the 3 lines in the top right corner and then tap on Contact Us. We look forward to hearing from you.

reviews.text: Be careful. I read that this app would remove an unwanted object from a video. It not only didn't do that nor could I find a way, It totally locked up at one point freezing my phone I couldn't minimize the screen nor could I even restart it for a minute or so. Everything was unavailable. This is the only app I've ever had do that! Not only that I downloaded this again because I was looking for an app that could handle exportation of 4K video and this one couldn't.
reviews.replyText: Thanks for your review and sorry to hear this. If you have any feedback on how we can improve the app or your experience, please don't hesitate to contact us at videoleap.android.support@lightricks.com

reviews.text: Makes it impossible to cancel free trial or reach customer service. I tried multiple times through the app to cancel, but the feature was broken. It didn't show up on Google play subscriptions to cancel there. I emailed them, because that's the only contact form provided, and got no response. All of this days before the trial expired. They charged me anyway. I'm peeeeved.
reviews.replyText: Sorry to hear this. Can you please send your receipt/invoice to videoleap.android.support@lightricks.com so that we can help you directly, thank you.

reviews.text: Downloaded the subscription at the monthly $7.99 price, but I'm glad I no longer plan on continuing service after just one month. The app crashed several times after I created a 12-second video from two still pics. The minute I added music, which is offered through the app, it crashed. I don't see the reason why you'd want to spend time editing if a finished project will never be recoverable. Don't buy this app, regardless of how cool the ads make it seem on IG.
reviews.replyText: This doesn't seem right. Please reach out to our Customer Experience team from within the app so we have all the information required to look into this: Tap on the Help screen icon (second from the top left corner) and tap Contact Us. We will do our best to assist you!

reviews.text: Don't get this app. Total garbage. When it was just a video editing app it worked great but now they are trying to make it a social media app and the whole thing fell apart. You can't export your videos most of the time. When you try and export your video it just says "something went wrong". I have had multiple videos that I put a lot of work in to editing that are now just sitting in the app and I can't export them. Customer service is useless. Plenty of better options out there. Skip this one

After purchasing a year subscription. Everytime I export a project there is no audio in the video. I now use capcut for free and have a much better experience. I'll be sure to further test apps in the future before giving them my money. So they get 2 stars for teaching me a lesson. If in the next year the problem is fixed I will edit my review. Fingers crossed ü§û Edit: 1 dtar because now it won't even let me use templates. It just says try again over and over. Such a disappointment üòû

Signed up for the 7 day free trial to give the editor a chance for my business. On day 2 (3/12) I did not like the app at all. Tried canceling multiple times on 3/12 but kept getting an error message. Reached out to customer service to get help on 3/11. I was still charged an annual subscription on 3/18. The same error message has come up everyday for the entire week and no one from customer service has reached out to help. Stay FAR away from this app!!
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your review and so sorry for this. Please message us at reviews.support@lightricks.zendesk.com so we can look into this right away for you. Have a great day.

reviews.text: It's a good app! It's easy to use and quite easy to figure out for beginners. However, there are a few things I wish were in the app. I wish you could do animation on pictures (such as a pan & zoom), and I also wish that the layering function was easier to use. The layering function puts each layer in the same row, so it's hard to edit the layers under another. I also hope that they make it so that you can add more than one piece of text. Other than that, it's a fairly good editing app.
reviews.replyText: Thanks for writing in. If you have any additional feedback or specific requests, please don't hesitate to contact our Customer Experience team - videoleap.android.support@lightricks.com. We'd love to hear from you!

reviews.text: One reason I've paid for this app is that it had all the features i needed in one- especially a feature where I could put my voice over a video. I make tutorials, so it was perfect to narrate instructions over the video. Now, for some reason, that feature is no longer available. The icon should be next to the music + sound effects under the audio option. Also, every time I open up the app now, I'm bombarded with a very loud reel that looks more like tiktok and less like a video editing app.
reviews.replyText: Thanks for writing in, we would like to look into this right away. Please email our Customer Experience team at videoleap.android.support@lightricks.com. We'd like to help!

reviews.text: I enjoyed the application and its features. However, I began experiencing a rapid battery drain on my Android device. Using Developer Options on my device,, I was able to locate the issue. The application was not open, and all permissions denied. Videoleap still performed 107 location tracking attempts in 5 days. It also was tagged for 39% of battery usage in that same time frame. More than Google or any other application. Read the Privacy Statement! Does much more than what is stated. Deleted.

app.AIReview:
Videoleap: AI Video Editor ‚Äì A Comprehensive Review

Overview

Videoleap, currently boasting 18,871,333 installs and a robust 4.43328/5 rating based on 195,513 user reviews, positions itself as the ultimate all-in-one AI video editor, reel maker, and video enhancer. The app‚Äôs core promise ‚Äì transforming ideas into professional-looking videos quickly and easily ‚Äì is a compelling one, particularly in today's saturated social media landscape. The ‚ÄúFree‚Äù price point makes it an attractive entry point for both casual users and budding content creators looking to experiment with AI-powered video editing without significant financial commitment. However, the success of Videoleap hinges on the efficacy of its AI tools and the overall usability of its interface. This review delves into a detailed analysis of the app‚Äôs features, performance, and user experience to determine whether it lives up to its ambitious claims.

Key Features

Videoleap offers a broad suite of features designed to streamline the video creation process. These include:

  • AI Video Generator: The cornerstone of the application, this feature allows users to generate videos from text prompts or image inputs. It leverages AI to create dynamic scenes and add appropriate music and effects.
  • Reel Maker: Specifically tailored for Instagram Reels, this tool provides pre-designed templates, trending audio tracks, and easy editing capabilities.
  • Video Enhancer (AI Upscaling): A standout feature that uses AI to improve the resolution and quality of existing videos ‚Äì a critical benefit for repurposing older content or low-quality footage.
  • Smart Cut: Automatically segments video clips based on changes in audio or visual cues, saving users significant editing time.
  • Text-to-Speech: Converts text into natural-sounding voiceovers, adding another layer of creative control.
  • Music Library & Sound Effects: Provides a library of royalty-free music and sound effects to enhance videos.
  • Transitions & Effects: Offers a variety of transitions and visual effects for adding polish to your creations.
  • Green Screen Effect: Allows users to remove backgrounds seamlessly, opening up possibilities for dynamic content creation.

Strengths

Several aspects of Videoleap contribute to its popularity:

  • Ease of Use (Beginner-Friendly): The app‚Äôs intuitive interface and guided workflows make it remarkably accessible even for users with no prior video editing experience. The Smart Cut feature is a prime example, drastically reducing the time required to create engaging clips.
  • Powerful AI Capabilities: The AI Video Generator and Video Enhancer demonstrate genuine potential. While not always perfect, they significantly accelerate the creative process and provide impressive results ‚Äì especially considering the app‚Äôs free tier. The ability to upscale low-resolution videos to a usable standard is particularly valuable.
  • Relevance to Current Trends: The dedicated Reel Maker aligns perfectly with the dominant platform for short-form video content. Offering pre-designed templates incorporating trending audio ensures users can quickly create relevant and engaging Reels.
  • Large User Base & Active Community: With over 18 million installs, Videoleap enjoys a substantial user base, fostering a potential community for support, inspiration, and sharing creations.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Videoleap isn't without limitations:

  • AI Limitations: The AI-generated content, while impressive at times, can occasionally produce unnatural or slightly jarring results. More refined control over the AI‚Äôs parameters would greatly improve consistency and creative output.
  • Watermark on Free Tier: A prominent watermark is applied to videos created using the free version, which may be undesirable for professional use cases. Removing this requires a subscription upgrade.
  • Limited Advanced Editing Options: Compared to dedicated professional video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro), Videoleap lacks advanced features like multi-track editing or complex color grading tools.
  • Performance on Lower-End Devices: Given the processing demands of AI-powered features, the app‚Äôs performance can be noticeably sluggish on older smartphones or devices with limited RAM.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive and intuitive. The onboarding process is seamless, guiding users through the core functionalities without overwhelming them. Navigation within the app is straightforward, with clearly labeled icons and a logical layout. However, the abundance of features can sometimes feel slightly cluttered, potentially leading to confusion for new users. A more streamlined interface focusing on the most frequently used tools could enhance usability. The drag-and-drop functionality for adding elements feels natural and responsive.

Value for Money

Videoleap operates with a freemium model. The free version offers access to core features like the Reel Maker, basic video editing tools, and limited AI capabilities ‚Äì accompanied by the aforementioned watermark. The paid subscription unlocks premium features such as removing the watermark, accessing advanced AI functionalities (including higher-resolution upscaling), and utilizing additional templates and effects. Pricing tiers are competitive with other mobile video editors, but the effectiveness of the paid features will ultimately determine whether the upgrade is worthwhile for individual users. A trial period would be beneficial to assess the full potential before committing to a subscription.

Conclusion

Videoleap represents a significant step forward in accessible AI-powered video editing. Its intuitive interface, powerful AI tools (particularly the Video Enhancer and Smart Cut), and focus on trending content formats make it a compelling option for anyone looking to create engaging videos quickly and easily. While limitations exist ‚Äì primarily regarding the consistency of the AI and the presence of a watermark in the free version ‚Äì these are outweighed by the app's overall value proposition. For casual users, hobbyists, and aspiring social media creators, Videoleap is undoubtedly worth exploring. However, those seeking professional-grade editing capabilities may find themselves wanting more advanced features available only through a paid subscription. The current rating of 4.43 indicates widespread satisfaction, suggesting that Videoleap is successfully meeting the needs of its target audience ‚Äì at least for now.
